chunk:
La Roche Posay Toleriane Dermo-Cleanser

Brand: La Roche-Posay

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: 609129 - INGREDIENTS : AQUA, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, GLYCERIN, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, CARBOMER, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, CAPRYL GLYCOL.

Directions: Apply with fingertips, massaging in with a gentle circular motion. Carefully pat dry with

refully pat dry without rubbing. Rinsing optional. For external use only. High tolerance tested under dermatological control. Use with or without rinsing.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
